title: Arcane Gate
content:
Arcane Gate Level 6 Conjuration Spell Create two linked teleportation portals. 10 turns 18m Concentration Long Rest Action Level 6 Spell Slot

Level 6 Conjuration Spell

Create two linked teleportation portals.

18m Concentration Long Rest

Arcane Gate is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Arcane Gate is a Lvl 6 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Arcane Gate Information

Description: Create two linked teleportation portals. Level: Lvl 6 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: N/A

How to Acquire Arcane Gate

Arcane Gate can be acquired by the following classes: Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard Arcane Gate can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard
